overview:
Andre Bodson serves as vice president and general manager of the Printing & Personal Systems Group (PPS) commercial channel organization in the Europe, Middle East and Africa region (EMEA) for HP.

Previously, Andre Bodson has held a number of executive management roles at Dell, including general manager of Western Europe, head of Strategy and Sales Operations for EMEA, and general manager of sales for the Home and Small Business group for EMEA. Prior to Dell, Andre Bodson has held leadership positions in finance, manufacturing and operations with industry leaders such as General Electric or Lâ€™Oreal. He started his career with Arthur Andersen in 1987.

Andre Bodson holds a Master degree from Sciences-Po Paris and a post-graduate degree in Finance from Sorbonne University. He also is an alumni of the Advanced Management Program at INSEAD.
